00014 /**
00015 * Constructor of COSMOS format
00016 * @param filename Name of the file to be read.
00017 * @param model The model where the imported data will be saved.
00018 */
00019 COSMOS::COSMOS(System::String^ filename, Model^% model)
00020 {
00021         SystemModel=model;
00022         FileName=filename;
00023         ReadingFile = gcnew StreamReader(filename);
00024     FormatName="COSMOS";
00025 }

00027 /**
00028 * Main function for opening and reading file
00029 * @return Returns false if the format does not seem to be correct.
00030 */
00031 bool COSMOS::LoadFile(void)
00032 {
00033         bool  OK = true;
00034 
00035         //Turn off Refreshing for faster importing
00036         AtomCollection->Refreshing=false;
00037 
00038 
00039         int number=2;                                           //number of fields in each line
00040         int totalAtoms=0;                                       //total number of atoms in the system
00041         int totalBonds=0;                                       //total number of bonds in the system
00042         String^ fileline=gcnew String("");  //line
00043         array<String^>^numbers = nullptr;   // Matrix of the fields after splitting of a line
00044         String^ delimStr = " ,";            //seperator of fields
00045         array<Char>^delimiter = delimStr->ToCharArray(); //Conversion to char array
00046 
00047 
00048         //Read the file until the end of it and as long flag OK is true
00049         while (!ReadingFile->EndOfStream  && OK )
00050         {
00051                 fileline=ReadLine();
00052 
00053                 //Read atom section
00054                 //ATOMS 72
00055                 if(fileline->Contains("ATOMS"))
00056                 {
00057                         //Read number of atoms and Bonds
00058                         number=2;
00059                         numbers=fileline->Split(delimiter,StringSplitOptions::RemoveEmptyEntries );
00060                         if(number=numbers->Length) 
00061                         {
00062                                 if (!Int32::TryParse(numbers[1], totalAtoms )) OK=false;
00063                         }
00064                         else
00065                                 throw gcnew Exception("Problem in Reading Atom and Coordinates in Line "+LineCount+".");
00066 
00067 
00068 
00069                         number=18;
00070                         //Read the atom format: H12_c1 1  0.82629  7.03135  4.14038 csmb  0.24052 9 2 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 0  //
00071                         for(int i=0;i<totalAtoms;i++)
00072                         {
00073                                 fileline=ReadLine();
00074 
00075                                 //Split the line to a number of fields
00076                                 numbers=fileline->Split(delimiter,StringSplitOptions::RemoveEmptyEntries );
00077                                 if(number=numbers->Length) 
00078                                 {
00079                                         try {
00080                                                 Atom^ nAtom=gcnew Atom();
00081                                                 int AtomicN;
00082                                                 double x,y,z;
00083 
00084                                                 //Try to read coordinates and atomic number
00085                                                 if (!Int32::TryParse(numbers[1], AtomicN) || !Double::TryParse(numbers[2], x) || 
00086                                                         !Double::TryParse(numbers[3], y ) || !Double::TryParse(numbers[4], z )) 
00087                                                         throw gcnew Exception("Error in Atom coordinates and atomic number");
00088                                                 else 
00089                                                 {
00090                                                         //Save  coordinates in the model
00091                                                         nAtom->X=x;nAtom->Y=y;nAtom->Z=z;
00092 
00093                                                         //Check if the second char is lower than n it means that  it 
00094                                                         //belongs to the name of the element  else also remove it
00095                                                         if(Char::IsLower(numbers[0][1])) numbers[0]=numbers[0]->Remove(2);
00096                                                         else numbers[0]=numbers[0]->Remove(1);
00097 
00098                                                         //Can throw exception if does not find the isotope
00099                                                         try{
00100                                                                 nAtom->isotope=Isotopes::FindIsotope(numbers[0],AtomicN, 0);
00101                                                         }
00102                                                         catch(String ^ e)
00103                                                         {
00104                                                                 nAtom->isotope=Isotopes::FindIsotope(nullptr,AtomicN, 0);
00105                                                         };
00106                                                         AtomCollection->Add(nAtom);
00107                                                 };
00108                                         }
00109                                         catch(String ^ e)
00110                                         {
00111                                                 //Wrong format of the field, where coordinates not giving number and where 
00112                                                 //isotope not giving valid isotope name
00113                                                 throw gcnew Exception("Problem in Reading COSMO format:"+e) ;
00114                                         }
00115                                 } //Wrong number of fields read
00116                                 else throw gcnew Exception("Problem in Reading Atom and Coordinates in Line "+LineCount+".") ;
00117                         };
00118                 }//Reading interactions-couplings section
00119                 else if((fileline->Contains("CALCULATED_PROPERTIES")))
00120                 {
00121                         fileline=ReadLine();
00122 
00123                         //Loop over all atoms
00124                         for(int i=0;i<totalAtoms;i++)
00125                         {
00126                                 number=2;
00127                                 //Split the line to a number of fields
00128                                 numbers=fileline->Split(delimiter,StringSplitOptions::RemoveEmptyEntries );
00129                                 if(number<=numbers->Length) 
00130                                 {   
00131                                         //Set the Atom which the interaction is read
00132                                         int atomID;
00133                                         Int32::TryParse(numbers[0], atomID);
00134                                         Atom ^ A=AtomCollection[atomID];
00135 
00136                                         //Read until end of senction
00137                                         OK=true;
00138                                         while (fileline!="END_CALCULATED_PROPERTIES"   && OK )
00139                                         {
00140                                                 //Read line which is shielding or j-couplings or others
00141                                                 fileline=ReadLine();
00142 
00143 
00144                                                 //Read chemical shielding
00145                                                 if(fileline->Contains("CS-TENSOR"))
00146                                                 {
00147                                                         //It is chemical shielding, so conversion to shift is needed
00148                                                         ToShift= true;
00149 
00150                                                         //Split the line to a number of fields
00151                                                         number=7;
00152                                                         numbers=fileline->Split(delimiter,StringSplitOptions::RemoveEmptyEntries );
00153                                                         try {
00154 
00155                                                                 //Try to read matrix
00156 								::Matrix3x3 ^a_tensor=gcnew ::Matrix3x3();
00157                                                                 a_tensor[5]=0.0f; a_tensor[6]=0.0f; a_tensor[7]=0.0f; 
00158                                                                 double xx,yy,zz,xy,xz,yz;
00159                                                                 if (number!=numbers->Length ||
00160                                                                         !Double::TryParse(numbers[1], xx) || 
00161                                                                         !Double::TryParse(numbers[2], yy) || 
00162                                                                         !Double::TryParse(numbers[3], zz) ||
00163                                                                         !Double::TryParse(numbers[4], xy) ||
00164                                                                         !Double::TryParse(numbers[5], xz) ||
00165                                                                         !Double::TryParse(numbers[6], yz) ) 
00166                                                                         throw gcnew String("Error in CS-Tensor");
00167                                                                 else {
00168                                                                         a_tensor[0]=xx;a_tensor[1]=xy;a_tensor[2]=xz;
00169                                                                         a_tensor[3]=xz;a_tensor[4]=yy;a_tensor[8]=zz;
00170 
00171                                                                         //Add chemical shielding interaction, unit and reference frame
00172                                                                         Tensor^ nInteraction=gcnew Tensor(A, A, InteractionKind::Shift, a_tensor);
00173                                                                         nInteraction->unit=Units::ppm;
00174                                                                         nInteraction->Frame=SystemModel->RefFrameCollection[1];
00175                                                                         InteractionCollection->Add(nInteraction);
00176                                                                 };
00177                                                         }
00178                                                         catch(String ^ e)
00179                                                         {       
00180                                                                 //Wrong number of fields read or Wrong format of fields
00181                                                                 throw gcnew Exception("Problem in Reading COSMO format:"+e) ;
00182                                                         };
00183                                                 }//Read J-COUPLINGS
00184                                                 else if(fileline->Contains("J-COUPLINGS"))
00185                                                 {
00186                                                         //Split the line to a number of fields
00187                                                         number=3;
00188                                                         numbers=fileline->Split(delimiter,StringSplitOptions::RemoveEmptyEntries );
00189                                                         try {
00190 
00191                                                                 int coupled;
00192                                                                 double value;
00193                                                                 Atom ^ B;
00194 
00195                                                                 //Try to read matrices for each combination
00196 								::Matrix3x3 ^Matrix=gcnew ::Matrix3x3();
00197                                                                 Matrix[1]=0.0; Matrix[2]=0.0; Matrix[3]=0.0; 
00198                                                                 Matrix[5]=0.0; Matrix[6]=0.0; Matrix[7]=0.0;
00199                                                                 for(int j=0;j<((numbers->Length-1)/2);j++)
00200                                                                 {
00201                                                                         if (!Int32::TryParse(numbers[j*2+1], coupled) || 
00202                                                                                 !Double::TryParse(numbers[j*2+2], value) ) 
00203                                                                                 throw gcnew Exception("Error in J-COUPLINGS");
00204                                                                         else {  
00205                                                                                 Matrix[0]=value; Matrix[4]=value; Matrix[8]=value;
00206                                                                                 B=AtomCollection[coupled];
00207 
00208                                                                                 //Add chemical shielding interaction, unit and reference frame
00209                                                                                 Tensor^ nInteraction=gcnew Tensor(A, B, InteractionKind::Jcoupling, Matrix);
00210                                                                                 nInteraction->unit=Units::Hz;
00211                                                                                 nInteraction->Frame=SystemModel->RefFrameCollection[1];
00212                                                                                 InteractionCollection->Add(nInteraction);
00213                                                                         };
00214                                                                 };
00215 
00216                                                         }
00217                                                         catch(String ^ e)
00218                                                         {       
00219                                                                 //Wrong format of fields
00220                                                                 throw gcnew Exception("Problem in Reading COSMO format:"+e) ;
00221                                                         };
00222                                                 }
00223                                                 else if(fileline->Contains("RDC-TENSOR") ||
00224                                                         fileline->Contains("ORDER-TENSOR") ||
00225                                                         fileline->Contains("QC-TENSOR") ||
00226                                                         fileline->Contains("DD-TENSOR") ||
00227                                                         fileline->Contains("DISTANCES"))
00228                                                 {
00229                                                         //Do Nothing
00230                                                 }
00231                                                 else OK=false; //Do Nothing
00232                                         };
00233 
00234                                 };
00235 
00236                         };
00237 
00238                 };
00239 
00240         };
00241 
00242         //Turn on again Refreshing which causes calculation of bonds
00243         AtomCollection->Refreshing=true;
00244         ReadingFile->Close();
00245         return true;
00246 }
